评论详情: Good deal and good bra. Very comfortable and doesn’t wear like a nursing bra. If you need a lot of support you won’t find that in this bra, but it is sufficient support for my size and excellent materials. I like how the cups are sewn in so they don’t shift or fall out but can be slightly removed for easily cleaning all that milk leakage out #iykyk

This bra is really comfy & functional during the day. The material isn’t super thick, but I’m not really wearing anything tight at this point, so that’s not a big deal. However, the few hours that I get to sleep at night, I wake up soaked in milk. I’m quite literally falling out of the cups, making it impossible for the breast pads to catch any milk.

It’s very comfortable and for the cost the quality is very good. The material isn’t to thick it’s actually very light but it gives you more support than expected. I ordered mine a little to small I’m normally a 38C and got a medium. The cup size fits perfect but the band is a little tight. Definitely ordering more in a large !

I love the quality of this bra, it’s not thick like some nursing bras to where you see the outlines through a fitted top but it’s not so thin that your nips just poke out. It holds you in place and doesn’t make you look like you have a uni-boob. It’s easy to put on and pull down the straps to nurse or pump, it’s also easy to get back off. The pads inside also don’t shift around like most nursing bras do which is a bonus. I’d say that overall it is worth it for the price!

评论概述: Sizes are waaaayyyyy off!!!! Not heavy sweet friendly at all.
评论详情: Although the quality is nice, this is supposed to be a size 3XL. This SHOULD be a size XL. Not only is the waist wayyyy too small, the cup size doesn’t even cover HALF of my breast. Super super disappointed in this product. Definitely will be returning and purchasing from a different brand.
This is the best nursing bra! The price is great and the quality is amazing!

I feel like this would work better for smaller cup sizes. I'm a DDD and constantly falling out of it. There's no support and then when I unclip it to nurse, the little bit of support it does have, just disappears. It's very stretchy and seems to get looser the more I wear it. I wouldn't buy this again. It's more frustrating to wear than it should be. Definitely not worth the money.

评论概述: So much smaller than other Momcozy bra colors!
评论详情: I love this bra and have it in tan. And one with two-tone straps one XL (which is too big) and an L which is perfect (w/o eExtender that comes with it). Needing a second I ordered it in black in a size large however I can barely fit it with the band extended. Band and cup size small.

评论用户: In received the item it was worn and used.
评论详情: This item I received was used and worn.  Disgusting
Unless you're okay with very minimal coverage and bulges under a shirt, then the 3XL might not be big enough for a true 38DD.
ok

I love this brand. I wanted to like this bra but unfortunately it has been uncomfortable. I've tried adjusting everything to make it work. My boob falls out when I'm bending over, I have a toddler so I'm constantly picking up things. My boob comes out of the bottom as well. One of the straps will come off the hook occasionally and by surprise.  I went off the measurement chart and ordered accordingly. Wouldn't recommend.

These bras are so very comfortable and were honestly my favorite nursing bras (I have several so they weren’t worn every day), HOWEVER, one of the 2 I purchased broke out of nowhere. The clip where it attaches/detaches for nursing, just ripped out of the fabric while in the washer and now I can’t use it. So the quality should be better for the price. I feel like they should last longer than 5 months, especially only being worn maybe once a week.

Pre pregnancy I was a 36D. Now that I’m pregnant with my third and it seems like my breasts double in size when I’m pregnant. 20 weeks pregnant now and my bra size has gone up to 40DD. I ordered this bra in the 2X. Fully expecting it to fit but surprisingly the cups were too small causing “spillage” of my boobs. The band was perfect, wasn’t digging or anything. So I decided to order the 3x and this one fits perfectly. It’s so comfortable and now I can order a few more in this exact size!
I have two of these bras and they are the absolute best! The fabric is buttery soft and it’s so comfortable. I will only use these from now on!

评论概述: Nice fit & material - stretches out kinda quickly
评论详情: The fit is quite nice. The material is great. Loled the amount of support and ease of access. The one thing that is the draw back is that it seems to have stretched out kinds quickly. Not sure what the average life span on bras is, but this seemed to stretch out sooner than expected. Still at this price point, I would probably buy again - just knowing it was a shorter life span on it.
I order a 2xl thinking I'd have growing room and I do not. I am not a big woman nor do I have the biggest boobs but for some reason this bra does not fit well and runs small for me

The fabric is soft and thin… But it’s so soft and thin that it doesn’t stay in place. It keeps wrinkling up in the back. The back strap keeps unhooking itself so I keep having to take off my entire shirt to rehook the back of the strap. It’s really not worth the money for all the inconvenience tbh. I’d rather just buy the knockoffs with the thicker fabric that may not be as soft but at least it stays in place. I wanted to love it but I can’t.
These are the best nursing bras I’ve found, great quality, true to size. Great value
This is a nice bra but for the price i expected a bit more support. The bands start to stretch out over time and I’m constantly having to tighten the straps
I would give this product a 0 stars if I could, I ordered the two pack for 50 dollars and only received one bra.

I returned this bra right away. It’s not worth the price, not even the sale price, quality is terrible. It runs small, yet it has all this extra fabric under the arms. Unless you have a ton of fat under your arms. It bulges out yet cups are small. It’s the weirdest fit. It’s also paper thin, I could see my nipples as soon as I put it on. Not sure how this has such good reviews. Go with the As Fairy nursing bra…hands down the best! Better price and much better quality and fit

This bra a very soft and offers so support. I bought it in April and when I wear it feels like I don’t have the snaps attached. The gap on the side is very noticeable and gets worse with time. I would recommend getting a set of the other three to a pack nursing bras on Amazon.

评论概述: Stay away if small ribs and large breasts
评论详情: I was really excited for these because my chest grew a large amount while Breastfeeding and have been seriously underwhelmed. The band doesn't stay flat around my ribs and rolls, it also leaves back fat rolls and is not smoothing. Lastly, the straps have started coming off where they hook to the band, literally just happened while I was sitting on the couch not moving. I have 4 of these bras and experience the same issue on them all. I also measured multiple times to ensure I ordered the correct size.  For reference I have a smaller band size and large cup size and ordered an XL. This could be an issue for my body type.

评论概述: Comfortable, Practical, and Supportive ~ A Must Have for Nursing Moms!
评论详情: I recently tried the Momcozy Nursing Bras for Breastfeeding, and I’m extremely impressed by their comfort, functionality, and overall design. As a breastfeeding mom, finding a bra that provides support while being easy to use is a game-changer, and this one delivers on all fronts.  The material is incredibly soft and breathable, making it perfect for all-day wear. It’s gentle on the skin, which is especially important for sensitive areas during nursing. The straps are adjustable, and the band feels snug but not restrictive, offering just the right amount of support without digging in.  One of the best features is how easy it is to nurse while wearing this bra. The clips are simple to open and close with one hand, which makes feeding your baby much more manageable, especially during nighttime feedings. The bra also has removable padding, which is a nice touch for added convenience and customization.  Even though it’s designed for nursing, the bra still offers solid support. It gives good lift and helps maintain a flattering shape without being overly structured or uncomfortable. I feel secure and supported throughout the day, whether I’m at home or out and about.  I love that the Momcozy Nursing Bra comes in various colors, so you can easily find one to match your style or wardrobe. It’s discreet enough to wear under regular clothes and looks sleek, not bulky.  If you’re a nursing mom looking for comfort, support, and practicality, I highly recommend the Momcozy Nursing Bra. It makes breastfeeding so much easier and more comfortable, without sacrificing style or support. A great addition to any nursing mom’s wardrobe!
These bras had the most toxic smell!! I’ve washed three times and they still stink so bad. I’ve had one other mom cozy bra with no problems. These are being returned.
This bra is so soft and comfortable. I bought several all different brands and none compare. This by far my favorite. Fits true to size and straps stay on well
The best nursing bra.

Loved this bra it was super comfy and nursing was smooth. After the fourth wash I noticed the fabric had started ripping at the straps at the back and I followed the care instructions hand wash cold water with mild detergent! Super upset because I was loving this bra but can’t afford to spend the money after only four washes!
Llego ayer 24/dic, sucio (ver foto), se ve de  buena calidad de tela y se ve que es cómodo, pero mal control al salir de la tienda.

I was really excited to purchase this bra especially since most people love it. This is my third baby so all I’ve ever worn is bras that do not hold up the ladies. I had to purchase this twice the large did not fit even with the extended. I recently received my extra large and I’m not sure if it’s because I’m pregnant or the size runs small but again I have to use the extender which is disappointing. Material is very soft however it does fold slightly under the breasts. Will be trying to officially wear it once baby comes.
Color was as expected and quality is great, material thickness is breathable yet durable and this product is easy to use especially with the strap adjustment. Good value for the monies.
I have a narrow frame and big bust, the fit was not good. Needed better coverage to avoid popping over.

The run very small. I bought medium because i am usually small and thinking for the breastfeeding and being more comfortable a medium will be good , well it isnt is not comfy and you have to add the attachment so it can fit.

I'd give this bra a 5 star rating, however, being it's for nursing I would of liked it to cover a little more and only exposing my nipple not my entire breast. Color was great, it's soft and supports my larger chest. True to size according to the size guide.

Overall I like this bra. It offers versatility during my third trimester with my shifting body. The sides do stick out no matter what and sometimes the band material can feel pretty uncomfortable. I would say I like it more than I dislike it. The fabric color is pretty and the shape is great and it offers wonderful support. I can see how this bra will work for me for a long time.
This bra is SO COMFY!! I am usually a L in these things, I am 34 DD. Being pregnant obviously I am a little bit bigger but I was surprised to see it ran a bit on the smaller side. I would size up!
Good quality
Great bra, but after one use it's already stained from a sweater I was wearing and it looks really dirty. Recommend getting a dark color to avoid the bleeding of color from other clothing

评论概述: Great bra for a couple months
评论详情: Very comfortable bra, I prefer the momcozy bra out of any other. The only downside is it does get stretched out from use and I had to replace them after a few months.

评论概述: Size guide was way off, size up
评论详情: The quality of the bra was good and the bras were very soft and buttery; however, the size guide was way off and they were way too small!
good support, looks good under clothes, probably a 36D and probably should have gotten a Large but the Medium fit w extender. best nursing bra I have ordered yet
Will be returning because the product arrived used and won’t be ordering again because this kind of thing really grosses me out.

评论概述: Disappointing Fit and Lack of Support
评论详情: I recently tried the Momcozy Nursing Bras for Breastfeeding, and unfortunately, it did not meet my expectations. The bra was not a good fit and felt too flimsy, lacking the necessary support I needed. As a result, it was uncomfortable to wear. I will be donating it, as it did not work for me.  Overall, I was disappointed with the Momcozy Nursing Bras. It may work for others, but I needed more support and a better fit.
True to size. Very support of and comfy

评论概述: Comfy cups but short straps for tall people
评论详情: The fabric feels really nice and the cups fit well, but I’m on the tall side and with the straps all the way out, they were still digging into my shoulders. Disappointed.

Pro: super soft material  Con: cup size is WAY too small for the band size. The 3x band size has what I would say is a M cup. My pregnant boobs spilled out and I laughed when trying it on. Returning tomorrow.
This is the most buttery soft bra with the best support I’ve ever had with a nursing bra.

I haven't tested it out yet for a nursing bra (baby is due next month) but I will say that it's comfortable and soft. It also provides enough support for someone who is bigger breasted. I'd say for the price, it's worth it. I did have to size up though so keep that in mind if you're borderline between two sizes.
With this being my third baby I have tried multiple nursing bras and this bra has been by far the most comfortable bra I have own.

These are so comfy. They are worth the price. Pricey but you get what you pay for. High quality. So smoothie on the nipples. If you have sore chapped nipples the softness helps when putting on this bras compared to others! And the girls feel supported.

评论概述: Nice, if you get what you ordered
评论详情: I bought one and was really practical and made of nice fabric, decided to buy a second one, they sent the wrong size, returned it, and they sent me now the right size but does not include the extra extender.
Comfy but if you're using the bra hack for pumping, this doesn't have enough support for that. I wouldn't recommend if you have large breasts either.
I’ve tried a few other bras but this is the most comfortable. It also comes with extenders for the straps and clasps, which will be great as the body changes!  Will buy another one.
Overall great bra,  but it's a bit itchy on the back and it folds under the breast area which can be uncomfortable.

评论概述: I wanted to love this, but it just doesn't work
评论详情: I really wanted to love this bra, as soon as I opened it the material was amazing. Overall the cups felt very large compared to the bra size, the band was tight and kept folding at the bottom any time I moved. The pads did nothing to hide my nipples and I'm concerned that they will not last through more than one wash.

评论概述: Band stretched out within a month
评论详情: The band stretched out to the point of being too big on the tightest setting within a month of wear. Washed on cold and hung dry. I started on the loosest setting but now it’s so stretched out even on the tightest it rides up my back. I would return if the window hadn’t closed
Amazing product, the fabric is so soft! It is trie to size so I would size up for those days where we feel more full.

The bust of the bra is defined and significantly smaller than one would expect with a nursing bra. The band also runs small. I returned mine, didn’t want to waste my time waiting for shipments and trying to guess my size.  The quality of the bra also didn’t match the sale price of $23 in my opinion. Not worth the trouble.

The makers of momcozy nursing bras either have never breastfed a baby and/or hate women. These are the most uncomfortable bras I have ever worn, unfortunate choice of fabric for nursing moms that already have sore nipples it rubs them even more and they definitely run small - band extender they send helps but makes it scratchy in the back.
The bra is soft and smooth like pictured but it just doesn’t feel very comfortable to me. It could be because my boobs feel heavy or it could be the bra… not sure. Going to try a different brand!

I tried to love this but I just don’t. If you’re a cotton gal this is not for you, the material has made me sweat anytime I put it on. Literally unless you sit in front of ac all day long and have maids at your service this is not for you.
The product is super soft and it comes with an extension slip if you need the band wider!

评论用户: The clasp broke within the first week
评论详情: It was working fine for like two days and then it just broke.

The bra is soft and stretchy. I ordered the colors beige and brown in 2XL and that’s the colors that came. The straps fit all of the way around me and there was an extra extender in the package to make the straps a bit longer. Overall I think the value for your money is good. The bra is made of quality material similar to the material of those Knix period panties. The straps used for nursing are easy to snap on and off. At 39 weeks pregnant, I wear a 38DDD and I ordered both bras at 2XL, however my bust does not fit in the cups so I returned one to get a 3XL. I need one as I’m due in a few days. It’s not a huge issue but if my bust is not fitting now, I just anticipate that, as my milk comes in, my bust will get fuller and the 2XL will not contain me. The bra looks great under my shirts. I don’t see any bulges.

Comfy bra, material is nice, love the clip to pull down to feed my son, but it’s very tight. I’m 35 weeks pregnant and bought for my hospital bag/postpartum, but even with the extra extension it comes with, I have to wear on the largest clips. I am a lot bigger than my prepregnancy body but I still fit in my old bras and haven’t had to size up so I think these bras run small
Very comfortable

评论概述: Great! So much better than Kindred Bravely
评论详情: Thai bra is great! I am a 32DD pre pregnancy and 36DD post birth with a fair amount of engorgement and almost no bras work at all. I wanted Kindred Bravely to work (because of the busty sizes) but they have no support and the breast tissue is just smashed to hold it in. This bra has formed cups which is a huge differentiator! Definitely suggest for anyone with sensitivity, larger cup size etc.

I have another Momcozy bra and absolutely love it. I wish I would have just bought two of those but I ventured out and tried this version out and do not like it. It fits much smaller and tighter, I am overflowing in this bra and the other Momcozy nursing bra I have fits perfectly. Wish I could have just exchanged this one for another of the beige/pink one I have.

评论概述: Perfect for daily wear! So comfy!
评论详情: I love these bras for every day wear like going to the office etc. they are soft and fit well. It’s easy to BF in and you can even hold a pump in them (I’ve done it with mom cozy Mobile flow). They’re super comfy and I like the clips on them they are high quality
I wasn’t a fan of the fit of these. Too tight at rib cage so I see why they give an extender. But too loose in cups for me.
Very comfortable and fitting!!

评论概述: One of the worst maternity bras
评论详情: The bra strap snapped and tore after 3 months of use. I was told mom cozy is a great brand and the products are durable. But that's not the case. I want my money back but the item has only 1 month of return window.
This bra fits well and has great support. It looks great under clothes and has become by far my favorite nursing bra. Highly recommend!! Will be buying more.

It’s been two months since I wore this bra and it’s the only bra that held up its shape/form. The other bras that I purchased from other brands have stretched out by a lot and the shape is no longer the same. Momcozy bra has she softest material with a perfect stretch to it. Definetly recommend purchasing this product in many colors for a comfortable wear.
Bra was clearly used, had a giant blue stain on the front and smelled like scented lotion.

I have LIVED in this bra. It’s a great bra while nursing and can even stretch with you during pregnancy. It wears perfectly underneath almost everything and is easy to adjust, while being SO comfortable. I love that I can even criss cross the straps for racerback tops. Go ahead and stock up and get one for a friend.
El material es de excelente calidad muy suave y sujeta cómodamente. Lo estoy utilizando durante el embarazo y seguro será muy útil para el pos parto.
Good and comfy bras with enough support for my pregnant breasts. Fits great and stretchy.
I wanted to love this nursing bra because I love my Momcozy pump and bags etc; but I just hate it… it’s not supportive for big chested ladies. It barely holds the mobile pump in. Would not buy again
My breasts have gone from a b to a d cup and I never thought I’d find a comfortable and flattering bra but omgosh these are amazing I’ll buy and wear even when I’m done breast feeding!

Seamless, soft, and flattering nursing bra. I like that there is no bulkiness under clothing, provides a nice shape and coverage. I recommend buying this, especially great value if it’s on sale. Comparing to other cheap nursing bras I purchased, I wish I would have just bought a few of these instead. If you’re in-between sizes, I would recommend to check the chart but maybe size up. For reference, I purchased a medium using the chart and it fit perfectly for me. I was around a 32C or 34B prior to pregnancy and mostly bought small tops. Week four postpartum, I would say my band size went up a bit and breasts have definitely fluctuated close to a full C. I have the strap on the loosest setting, but band is forgiving (they also provide extender clip for band and straps are cross-back convertible). As a first time mom, I would like to add (something I didn’t know) that my band sizing the first week or so changed dramatically. If you are looking to use throughout pregnancy and freshly postpartum, definitely keep the extender clip! I’m currently four weeks postpartum and band is prefect, but I could see myself needing the extender prior.
Short straps and cups gap weird. The padding is raised about the bra so you couldn’t wear anything tight without the outline showing. Seems very cheap, bad quality for this price.
This bra is comfortable and fairly supportive for a nursing bra.

I love this nursing bra so much that I have it in two colors! It’s flattering and shaping, all while being comfy and easy to nurse with. My only gripes are the size charts (it’s letter sizes, so it isn’t super accommodating to us that have small rib cages but larger chests) and the pads (you can’t remove them easily, but they fold in the wash and retain any leaked breastmilk). I would say I’d buy it again, but I already did!
Supportive. Couldn’t see nipples through clothes. Easy to attach/reattach strap with one hand to nurse.
Really love this product and the ease of use when I need to breastfeed. I would have given 5 stars but just wish they had bigger size for large chested mamas.
Absolutely love this bra!!!

As a women who went from not wearing any bras to my boobs growing rapidly and requiring them, I found sports bras and underwire bras left me with nipple pain. Although I’m not breastfeeding yet, these bras are super comfy for just sensitivity during my pregnancy. I even recommended my non pregnant friends to get them just for the comfort. I tried all of the options on Amazon with good reviews, this was the least expensive and all were same quality. I did have a small issue: not much support when I’m laying down or on my side, I don’t think this is the fault of the bra, but does anyone know how to prevent this? I am ordering a smaller one for sleeping in hopes of it working.

评论概述: Size is perfect and good quality
评论详情: Great quality and size

This bra actually fits really well, it’s not frumpy or bulky like other nursing bras. Fits seamlessly under a t shirt. I have a large chest and this is my second time breastfeeding so to find a bra that offers comfort and support is huge! It is supportive enough to allow you to have a nice shape and be lifted under regular and form fitting clothes but not too tight that it causes compression or issues with mastitis from being too tight. I’ll be buying it in more colors! I ordered a large but might try an XL im a 38 DDD

I was really hoping to love this! It was overall very comfortable, but there was MAJOR gapping in the armpit area. I thought it might be a size issue, but after ordering another size it was the same. Ended up returning them both. A shame because they seemed nice otherwise! Might work for some but not for me.

评论概述: Daughter loves it says it’s super comfy
评论详情: Says it’s perfect

I have the momcozy nursing sports bra. This bra is amazing with fit and fabric.  I wanted to love these just as much. Unfortunately they weren’t supportive. The fabric is very soft, just doesn’t hold up like you need it to for BF tatas. The strap supporting while you are feeding is also very thin.
Makes things so much easier, good quality, fit, and color.

So thankful this came with an extension or it would not of fit. So prepregnacy I was a 36B. I'm not sure what size I am now but I ordered a L based off the size chart . I couldn't even get it close to locking in without the extension. If I ordered an XL the cup size would have been too big. As of now it's a tad big on the top edges but that's OK I plan on putting nursing pads in them and it looks ok with a shirt over
Fabric stretches out during wear and no longer supports during daily tasks. Cannot bend over without issues. Sizing down made cup size not fit.
This bra is so soft and comfortable. It’s the only bra I can wear while being 8 months pregnant and be comfortable in. I loved it so much I ended up buying more

If you’re a working mom of more than 1 little one who gets ready in the morning like the house is on fire, this bra is not for you. I wanted a nursing bra that didn’t look like it was only built for lounging around on a Friday night with friends or going for a quick jog. I wanted a comfortable bra with some structure. However, when I put this bra on for the 5th time or so, I threw a tank top over it and then a long sleeve. Somewhere along the way, I felt a small pop as the strap slid out of the little loop. Since I’m a “house on fire” kind of mom, I didn’t have time to fix it and had to deal with it for most of the morning. I thought it was just a mistake on my part until it happened again the next time I put it on . . .  Needless to say, this bra isn’t my favorite, especially given my current life circumstances (I.e., being a mom who is breastfeeding . . .).  I would recommend the non-convertible version of this bra with scalloped edges. It’s a 9/10 bra (minus one because the coverage makes it difficult to wear any of the shirts that I usually use for nursing in public).

Comfortable bra but everytime I wear it in public, the strap slides off and painfully snaps off from the back. You shouldn't even be able to remove the strap from back. I also own in every size (small, medium and large) and no matter what, they all snap. Also, the pads inside the bra constantly need adjusting. Almost more of a hassle than it should be.
